Deep Dive

Our blockchain engineers follow rigorous standards to ship secure contracts.

  • Languages: Solidity, Vyper, Rust (Solana), Move (Aptos/Sui)
  • Audit Tooling: Slither, MythX, Foundry, Echidna fuzz testing
  • CI/CD: Hardhat, Foundry automated test suites, multi-chain deployment scripts
  • Governance: OpenZeppelin Governor, DAO frameworks, on-chain voting integrations
